title: Ari Melber | A Closer Look: Pee Tape Allegations; Paul Ryan Retires; Trump Attacks Mueller
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump's allies ramping up their attacks on Robert Mueller and Paul Ryan's decision to get out of Washington.

Then, journalist Ari Melber talks about quoting hip-hop when talking politics, what Michael Cohen pleading the fifth could mean for Trump and writing a play about the Exxon Valdez oil spill in the third grade.

Finally, Melber takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for this podcast with producer Henry Melcher.
